2025-12-09T09:34:01.9243417Z hint: 	git config --global init.defaultBranch <name>

2025-12-09T09:34:01.9245202Z hint: 'development'. The just-created branch can be renamed via this command:
2025-12-09T09:34:01.9245737Z hint:
2025-12-09T09:34:01.9246032Z hint: 	git branch -m <name>

2025-12-09T09:36:31.7358605Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7358820Z [36;1mecho "--- 1. REGERANDO CLIENTE PRISMA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7359114Z [36;1mnpx prisma generate[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7359563Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7359759Z [36;1mecho "--- 2. MONTAGEM DO PACOTE ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7360022Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7360222Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7360413Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7360575Z [36;1m# Copia o App Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7360809Z [36;1mcp -R .next/standalone/. deploy/[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7361048Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7361487Z [36;1m# Copia estáticos (mas vamos limpar os pesados depois)[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7361865Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7362195Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7362508Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7362764Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7363036Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7363364Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7363555Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. OTIMIZAÇÃO DO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7363943Z [36;1m# Mantemos o node_modules já empacotado pelo output "standalone" do Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7364415Z [36;1m# (ele já contém apenas as dependências necessárias em produção).[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7364853Z [36;1m# Depois removemos metadados de repositório e realizamos a poda fina.[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7365289Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/.git deploy/.github deploy/.husky deploy/.vscode[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7365611Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7365882Z [36;1m# Mantemos os binários Debian do Prisma (compatíveis com o runner do SWA)[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7366289Z [36;1m# e removemos apenas arquivos grandes ou não usados.[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7366629Z [36;1mbash scripts/prune-deploy-artifact.sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7366896Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7367068Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. AÇÕES EXTRA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7367325Z [36;1m# Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7367713Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7368191Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7368582Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7368879Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7369165Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7369703Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7369968Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7370131Z [36;1m# Limpeza Geral[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7370340Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/docs[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7370554Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/logs[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7370788Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/Vitrine-De-Craques-App[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7371087Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/Vitrine-De-Craques-App-iOS[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7371336Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7371519Z [36;1mecho "--- 5. RELATÓRIO FINAL ---"[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7371785Z [36;1mecho "Tamanho Total (Meta: < 100MB):"[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7372036Z [36;1mdu -sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T09:36:31.7372224Z [36;1m[0m
